member.name: T:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.AudioFormat
member.summary: Defines the format of PCM data consumed or produced by Opus.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.AudioFormat.AllowedSampleRates
member.summary: Gets the collection of sampling rates (in Hz) the Opus encoder can use.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.AudioFormat.AllowedChannelCounts
member.summary: Gets the collection of channel counts the Opus encoder can use.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.AudioFormat.AllowedSampleDurations
member.summary: Gets the collection of sample durations (in ms) the Opus encoder can use.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.AudioFormat.Default
member.summary: Gets the default audio format. This is a format configured for 48kHz sampling rate, 2 channels, with music quality preset.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.AudioFormat.SampleRate
member.summary: Gets the audio sampling rate in Hz.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.AudioFormat.ChannelCount
member.summary: Gets the audio channel count.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.AudioFormat.VoiceApplication
member.summary: Gets the voice application, which dictates the quality preset.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.AudioFormat.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceApplication)
member.summary: Creates a new audio format for use with Opus encoder.
member.param: Audio sampling rate in Hz.
Number of audio channels in the data.
Encoder preset to use.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.AudioFormat.CalculateSampleSize(System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculates a sample size in bytes.
member.param: Millisecond duration of a sample.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.AudioFormat.GetMaximumBufferSize
member.summary: Gets the maximum buffer size for decoding. This method should be called when decoding Opus data to PCM, to ensure sufficient buffer size.
member.returns: Buffer size required to decode data.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.Codec.Interop
member.summary: This is an interop class. It contains wrapper methods for Opus and Sodium.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.Codec.Interop.SodiumKeySize
member.summary: Gets the Sodium key size for xsalsa20_poly1305 algorithm.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.Codec.Interop.SodiumNonceSize
member.summary: Gets the Sodium nonce size for xsalsa20_poly1305 algorithm.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.Codec.Interop.SodiumMacSize
member.summary: Gets the Sodium MAC size for xsalsa20_poly1305 algorithm.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.Codec.Interop.Encrypt(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte},System.Span{System.Byte},System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte},System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: Encrypts supplied buffer using xsalsa20_poly1305 algorithm, using supplied key and nonce to perform encryption.
member.param: Contents to encrypt.
Buffer to encrypt to.
Key to use for encryption.
Nonce to use for encryption.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.Codec.Interop.Decrypt(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte},System.Span{System.Byte},System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte},System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: Decrypts supplied buffer using xsalsa20_poly1305 algorithm, using supplied key and nonce to perform decryption.
member.param: Buffer to decrypt from.
Decrypted message buffer.
Key to use for decryption.
Nonce to use for decryption.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.Codec.OpusDecoder
member.summary: Represents an Opus decoder.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.Codec.OpusDecoder.AudioFormat
member.summary: Gets the audio format produced by this decoder.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.Codec.OpusDecoder.Initialize(DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.AudioFormat)
member.summary: Used to lazily initialize the decoder to make sure we're using the correct output format, this way we don't end up creating more decoders than we need.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.Codec.OpusDecoder.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes of this Opus decoder.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.Codec.EncryptionMode
member.summary: Specifies an encryption mode to use with Sodium.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.Codec.EncryptionMode.XSalsa20_Poly1305_Lite
member.summary: The nonce is an incrementing uint32 value. It is encoded as big endian value at the beginning of the nonce buffer. The 4 bytes are also appended at the end of the packet.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.Codec.EncryptionMode.XSalsa20_Poly1305_Suffix
member.summary: The nonce consists of random bytes. It is appended at the end of a packet.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.Codec.EncryptionMode.XSalsa20_Poly1305
member.summary: The nonce consists of the RTP header. Nothing is appended to the packet.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.DiscordClientExtensions.UseVoiceNext(DSharpPlus.DiscordClient)
member.summary: Creates a new VoiceNext client with default settings.
member.param: Discord client to create VoiceNext instance for.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.DiscordClientExtensions.UseVoiceNext(DSharpPlus.DiscordClient,DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConfiguration)
member.summary: Creates a new VoiceNext client with specified settings.
member.param: Discord client to create VoiceNext instance for.
Configuration for the VoiceNext client.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.DiscordClientExtensions.UseVoiceNextAsync(DSharpPlus.DiscordShardedClient,DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConfiguration)
member.summary: Creates new VoiceNext clients on all shards in a given sharded client.
member.param: Discord sharded client to create VoiceNext instances for.
Configuration for the VoiceNext clients.
member.returns: A dictionary of created VoiceNext clients.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.DiscordClientExtensions.GetVoiceNext(DSharpPlus.DiscordClient)
member.summary: Gets the active instance of VoiceNext client for the DiscordClient.
member.param: Discord client to get VoiceNext instance for.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.DiscordClientExtensions.GetVoiceNextAsync(DSharpPlus.DiscordShardedClient)
member.summary: Retrieves a instance for each shard.
member.param: The shard client to retrieve instances from.
member.returns: A dictionary containing instances for each shard.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.DiscordClientExtensions.ConnectAsync(DSharpPlus.Entities.DiscordChannel)
member.summary: Connects to this voice channel using VoiceNext.
member.param: Channel to connect to.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.Entities.AudioSender.GetTrueSequenceAfterWrapping(System.UInt16)
member.summary:
Accepts the 16-bit sequence number from the next RTP header in the associated stream and uses heuristics to (attempt to) convert it into a 64-bit counter that takes into account overflow wrapping around to zero.
This method only works properly if it is called for every sequence number that we see in the stream.
member.param: The 16-bit sequence number from the next RTP header.
member.returns: Our best-effort guess of the value that would have been, if the server had given us a 64-bit integer instead of a 16-bit one.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.EventArgs.VoiceReceiveEventArgs
member.summary: Represents arguments for VoiceReceived events.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.EventArgs.VoiceReceiveEventArgs.SSRC
member.summary: Gets the SSRC of the audio source.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.EventArgs.VoiceReceiveEventArgs.User
member.summary: Gets the user that sent the audio data.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.EventArgs.VoiceReceiveEventArgs.PcmData
member.summary: Gets the received voice data, decoded to PCM format.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.EventArgs.VoiceReceiveEventArgs.OpusData
member.summary: Gets the received voice data, in Opus format. Note that for packets that were lost and/or compensated for, this will be empty.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.EventArgs.VoiceReceiveEventArgs.AudioFormat
member.summary:
Gets the format of the received PCM data.
Important: This isn't always the format set in , and depends on the audio data received.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.EventArgs.VoiceReceiveEventArgs.AudioDuration
member.summary: Gets the millisecond duration of the PCM audio sample.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.EventArgs.VoiceUserJoinEventArgs
member.summary: Arguments for .

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.EventArgs.VoiceUserJoinEventArgs.User
member.summary: Gets the user who left.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.EventArgs.VoiceUserJoinEventArgs.SSRC
member.summary: Gets the SSRC of the user who joined.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.EventArgs.VoiceUserLeaveEventArgs
member.summary: Arguments for .

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.EventArgs.VoiceUserLeaveEventArgs.User
member.summary: Gets the user who left.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.EventArgs.VoiceUserLeaveEventArgs.SSRC
member.summary: Gets the SSRC of the user who left.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.IVoiceFilter
member.summary: Represents a filter for PCM data. PCM data submitted through a will be sent through all installed instances of first.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.IVoiceFilter.Transform(System.Span{System.Int16},DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.AudioFormat,System.Int32)
member.summary: Transforms the supplied PCM data using this filter.
member.param: PCM data to transform. The transformation happens in-place.
Format of the supplied PCM data.
Millisecond duration of the supplied PCM data.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.StreamExtensions.CopyToAsync(System.IO.Stream,DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceTransmitSink,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously reads the bytes from the current stream and writes them to the specified .
member.param: The source
The target
The size, in bytes, of the buffer. This value must be greater than zero. If , defaults to the packet size specified by .
The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceApplication
member.summary: Represents encoder settings preset for Opus.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceApplication.Voice
member.summary: Defines that the encoder must optimize settings for voice data.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceApplication.Music
member.summary: Defines that the encoder must optimize settings for music data.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceApplication.LowLatency
member.summary: Defines that the encoder must optimize settings for low latency applications.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConfiguration
member.summary: VoiceNext client configuration.

summary.para: Sets the audio format for Opus. This will determine the quality of the audio output.
Sets whether incoming voice receiver should be enabled.
Sets the size of the packet queue.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConfiguration.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of .

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConfiguration.#ctor(DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConfiguration)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of , copying the properties of another configuration.
member.param: Configuration the properties of which are to be copied.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConnection
member.summary: VoiceNext connection to a voice channel.

member.name: E:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConnection.UserSpeaking
member.summary: Triggered whenever a user speaks in the connected voice channel.

member.name: E:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConnection.UserJoined
member.summary: Triggered whenever a user joins voice in the connected guild.

member.name: E:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConnection.UserLeft
member.summary: Triggered whenever a user leaves voice in the connected guild.

member.name: E:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConnection.VoiceReceived
member.summary: Triggered whenever voice data is received from the connected voice channel.

member.name: E:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConnection.VoiceSocketErrored
member.summary: Triggered whenever voice WebSocket throws an exception.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConnection.AudioFormat
member.summary: Gets the audio format used by the Opus encoder.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConnection.IsPlaying
member.summary: Gets whether this connection is still playing audio.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConnection.WebSocketPing
member.summary: Gets the websocket round-trip time in ms.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConnection.UdpPing
member.summary: Gets the UDP round-trip time in ms.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConnection.TargetChannel
member.summary: Gets the channel this voice client is connected to.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConnection.ConnectAsync
member.summary: Connects to the specified voice channel.
member.returns: A task representing the connection operation.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConnection.SendSpeakingAsync(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sends a speaking status to the connected voice channel.
member.param: Whether the current user is speaking or not.
member.returns: A task representing the sending operation.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConnection.GetTransmitSink(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a transmit stream for this connection, optionally specifying a packet size to use with the stream. If a stream is already configured, it will return the existing one.
member.param: Duration, in ms, to use for audio packets.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConnection.WaitForPlaybackFinishAsync
member.summary: Asynchronously waits for playback to be finished. Playback is finished when speaking = false is signalled.
member.returns: A task representing the waiting operation.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConnection.Pause
member.summary: Pauses playback.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConnection.ResumeAsync
member.summary: Asynchronously resumes playback.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConnection.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects and disposes this voice connection.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextConnection.Dispose
member.summary: Disconnects and disposes this voice connection.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextEvents
member.summary: Contains well-defined event IDs used by the VoiceNext extension.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextEvents.Misc
member.summary: Miscellaneous events, that do not fit in any other category.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextEvents.VoiceHeartbeat
member.summary: Events pertaining to Voice Gateway connection lifespan, specifically, heartbeats.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextEvents.VoiceHandshake
member.summary: Events pertaining to Voice Gateway connection early lifespan, specifically, the establishing thereof as well as negotiating various modes.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextEvents.VoiceReceiveFailure
member.summary: Events emitted when incoming voice data is corrupted, or packets are being dropped.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextEvents.VoiceKeepalive
member.summary: Events pertaining to UDP connection lifespan, specifically the keepalive (or heartbeats).

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextEvents.VoiceDispatch
member.summary: Events emitted for high-level dispatch receive events.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextEvents.VoiceConnectionClose
member.summary: Events emitted for Voice Gateway connection closes, clean or otherwise.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextEvents.VoiceGatewayError
member.summary: Events emitted when decoding data received via Voice Gateway fails for any reason.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextEvents.VoiceWsRx
member.summary: Events containing raw (but decompressed) payloads, received from Discord Voice Gateway.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextEvents.VoiceWsTx
member.summary: Events containing raw payloads, as they're being sent to Discord Voice Gateway.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextExtension
member.summary: Represents VoiceNext extension, which acts as Discord voice client.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextExtension.IsIncomingEnabled
member.summary: Gets whether this connection has incoming voice enabled.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextExtension.Setup(DSharpPlus.DiscordClient)
member.summary: DO NOT USE THIS MANUALLY.
member.param: DO NOT USE THIS MANUALLY.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextExtension.ConnectAsync(DSharpPlus.Entities.DiscordChannel)
member.summary: Create a VoiceNext connection for the specified channel.
member.param: Channel to connect to.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceNextExtension.GetConnection(DSharpPlus.Entities.DiscordGuild)
member.summary: Gets a VoiceNext connection for specified guild.
member.param: Guild to get VoiceNext connection for.
member.returns: VoiceNext connection for the specified guild.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceTransmitSink
member.summary: Sink used to transmit audio data via .

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceTransmitSink.SampleDuration
member.summary: Gets the PCM sample duration for this sink.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceTransmitSink.SampleLength
member.summary: Gets the length of the PCM buffer for this sink. Written packets should adhere to this size, but the sink will adapt to fit.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceTransmitSink.VolumeModifier
member.summary: Gets or sets the volume modifier for this sink. Changing this will alter the volume of the output. 1.0 is 100%.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceTransmitSink.WriteAsync(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Writes PCM data to the sink. The data is prepared for transmission, and enqueued.
member.param: PCM data buffer to send.
Start of the data in the buffer.
Number of bytes from the buffer.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceTransmitSink.WriteAsync(System.ReadOnlyMemory{System.Byte},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Writes PCM data to the sink. The data is prepared for transmission, and enqueued.
member.param: PCM data buffer to send.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceTransmitSink.FlushAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Flushes the rest of the PCM data in this buffer to VoiceNext packet queue.
member.param: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceTransmitSink.Pause
member.summary: Pauses playback.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceTransmitSink.ResumeAsync
member.summary: Resumes playback.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceTransmitSink.GetInstalledFilters
member.summary: Gets the collection of installed PCM filters, in order of their execution.
member.returns: Installed PCM filters, in order of execution.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceTransmitSink.InstallFilter(DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.IVoiceFilter,System.Int32)
member.summary: Installs a new PCM filter, with specified execution order.
member.param: Filter to install.
Order of the new filter. This determines where the filter will be inserted in the filter pipeline.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.VoiceTransmitSink.UninstallFilter(DSharpPlus.VoiceNext.IVoiceFilter)
member.summary: Uninstalls an installed PCM filter.
member.param: Filter to uninstall.
